pages.title: A Horrible Idea
pages.text: $(o)With the defeat of the Ender Dragon, the curse on the Overworld has been lifted. With this newfound power, one can't help but wonder why the power of the Wither was sealed in the first place. The Overworld is surely safer without The Wither or The End, but what if...$().
$(bold)$(#f00)WARNING: This is a horrible idea. Nothing you have built will be safe. You've Been Warned.$()$()
